title: BRIEF-Vodafone Confirms Continental European Assets Deal Talks With Liberty Global
text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Vodafone Group Plc:
* VODAFONE ANNOUNCEMENT REGARDING MEDIA SPECULATION * ‍CONFIRMS THAT IT IS IN EARLY STAGE DISCUSSIONS WITH LIBERTY GLOBAL REGARDING POTENTIAL ACQUISITION OF CERTAIN OVERLAPPING CONTINENTAL EUROPEAN ASSETS OWNED BY LIBERTY GLOBAL​
* VODAFONE IS NOT IN DISCUSSION WITH LIBERTY GLOBAL REGARDING A COMBINATION OF BOTH COMPANIES
* ‍THERE IS NO CERTAINTY THAT ANY TRANSACTION WILL BE AGREED, NOR AS TO TERMS, TIMING OR FORM OF ANY TRANSACTION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
